VRPosePosition.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The position read-only property of the interface returns the position of the at the current timestamp as a 3D vector.

blockquote.para: This property was part of the old WebVR API. It has been superseded by the WebXR Device API.

remarks.para: The coordinate system is as follows:
Positions are measured in meters from an origin point — this point is either the position the sensor was first read at, or the position of the sensor at the point that was last called.

blockquote.para: By default, all positions are given as a sitting space position. Transforming this point with — when you are working with a room display for example — converts this to a standing space position.

VRPosePosition.value: A , or null if the VR sensor is not able to provide position data.User agents may provide emulated position values through techniques such as neck modeling; when doing so they should still report as false.
